r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
## Tracer
### Changed - Disable sidecar sending on lambda #2904
### Fixed - Fix exception property offset computation for PHP 8.1+ #2901 - Prevent Laravel Queue hooks from stacking up #2899 - Fix crash with missing name in span in debug mode #2893 - Restrict remote config path to a definite 31 chars DataDog/libdatadog#676
## Application Security Management
### Changed - Update event obfuscation regex #2897
### Fixed - Fix abort() call on appsec helper unload #2900
